column2: Criminal: The Last of the Innocent (2011) #2
column6: Things are going from bad to worse... One time All-American boy Riley Richards is caught in a brutal murder and double-cross that may just be the only way out of the trap that his life has become! And as always, each issue of Criminal contains unique back-up features, articles and artwork, which are only available in the single issues.
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller (cover):Sean Phillips | editor:Jeff Youngquist
